title: A suggestion of rework about SnowDay Bard
body: I think the snowday bard skin is really cool. But I kind disappoint of the ULT animation. It's the same as bard's other skin. Here is my idea: Instead of "Zhonya" your enemy champions, snowday bard's Ult turns enemy champions into BLUEISH  PENGUINS :D . Like when you get into his magical journey you transfer into a Penguin.  That will make it a perfect skin.  {{summoner:32}}

replies.body:
Hey why šo serious,

In regards to the ult, it's kept consistent throughout all of the skins for gameplay clarity.
LOL I noticed that, I wasn't think about that. Good point. A blue stasis instead of gold is a good enough change.
Don't get the downvotes, it's not a bad idea just needs a bit of tweaking. A light blue, silver or maybe even white colour would be good

a "frozen" stasis kinda okay. But become penguin?
err, it's just too hard to tell if it's a stasis or polymorph.

Can you imagine how chaotic and op that would be? An entire team turned into penguins? You couildn't tell a valuable target apart from a non-valuable target when you prepare your abilities lol. A blue stasis instead of gold is a good enough change.
